title: My Face When...
body:
My post gets a single downvote before any upvotes and then may as well have been deleted.
http://i.imgur.com/EQb0aIO.png[/img]

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Fenyx,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uadzbZc9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-28T21:37:10.401+0000)
>
> That Amumu face is... horrifying.

My First rito comment!
http://i.imgur.com/tyK4HTV.gif[/img]
Today shall not be the day for that face.
Ah, it's Caressing Stones. How are you?

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uadzbZc9,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-06-28T20:53:24.201+0000)
>
> Ah, it's Caressing Stones. How are you?

I believe you're mistaken, that's Touching Rocks you're talking to.
No that's his cousin, you are thinking of Touching Jewels, the black sheep of the family. They just had a sleep over and league accounts got mixed up

NONONO! Heathens! I'm sorry if they have offended you, Feeling Jewelry
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

squeels

it's grope stones!  and why does that sound like the name of a rock band XD

> [{quoted}](name=Fondling Gems,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uadzbZc9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-28T13:57:01.447+0000)
>
> Today shall not be the day for that face.

Ty. Though it was my post just b4 this one lul
Shhh child, it will all be ok.
Guess I could say the same for almost any forum *sniff*
